title: Mazedude's "The American Album" released!
content:
[url=http://mazedude.com/aa/]The American Album[/url]

A tribute to American VG composers everywhere, TAA is a collection of remixed tracks of some of the best known Americans in the business. Games include Grim Fandango, Myst, Earthworm Jim, Commander Keen 5, Jazz Jackrabbit 2, and more. Check it out.

Promotional plug out of the way, the Keen track is a mix of "Make It Tighter". If the game had been made today, I suspect it would sound a lot like this.

title: Re: Mazedude's "The American Album" released!
content:
